definition: To make something larger, broader, or more extensive, often by adding new elements or components. It is commonly used when referring to expanding or extending something, such as knowledge, skills, a business, a building, or a project.

examples.english: I want to expand my knowledge.
We need to expand our business areas.

examples.german: Die Schule plant, das Sportangebot zu erweitern.
examples.english: The school plans to expand the sports program.

examples.german: Er möchte seine Fähigkeiten erweitern, um bessere Jobchancen zu haben.
examples.english: He wants to enhance his skills to have better job opportunities.

examples.german: Die Stadt will den Park erweitern, um mehr Grünflächen zu schaffen.
examples.english: The city wants to expand the park to create more green spaces.
